Name: Terra Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Grass-type moves from damaging Ground-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Ground-type Pokémon.  You can get a Terra Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Brown Silk, a Ground Dust, and an Earth Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
